title: Thomas2205
author: Thomas2205
content: SugarYield is a Binance smart chain project where user can deposit their BNB into the caramel or saltish vault and can place a bet on the price of Stable coins and either they can win 3x BNB or lose their staked BNB.SugerYield Main Features:Pre Diabetes:Pre Diabetes is based on buying and selling of insurance according to user speculationCaramel Vaults:Caramel vaults are based on the risk strategy. Users can deposit BNB and it win get reward in BNBSaltish Vaults:Saltish Vault covers the Hedging side Post-diabetesPost-diabetes is a secondary marketplace that runs on top of Pre-diabetes' tokenized vaults. Users can buy and sell bets.Goverence:User can propose a proposal and theory voting decision decide Farming:Users can stake/farm their ERC 1155 token and get a impressive APRMobie APP:Mobile App is live on playstore and aslo APK available on GITHUB.Dapp:Dapp is live on test net. Users can deposite BNB right after fairlauch.Moreover Mobile app is live on playstore just download from this link:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sugar_yieldMore amazing perks is coming on sugaryield visit their website https://sugaryield.com/
